name: Nurse
description: Responsible for patient care, administering medication, and maintaining medical records.

name: Doctor
description: Responsible for diagnosing and treating patients, prescribing medication, and providing medical advice.

name: HR
description: Responsible for recruiting, managing employee relations, and overseeing organizational development.

name: Front Desk
description: Responsible for greeting patients, scheduling appointments, and managing front office operations.

name: Business Officer
description: Responsible for managing business operations, financial planning, and overseeing administrative functions.
